questions.question: Which sentence is grammatically correct: 'She don't like pizza.' or 'She doesn't like pizza.'?
What is the plural form of 'mouse'?
Choose the correct verb form: 'He ________ to the store yesterday.'
Identify the adverb in the sentence: 'She sings beautifully.'
What is the comparative form of 'good'?
Choose the correct form: 'I prefer coffee than tea.' or 'I prefer coffee to tea.'
Which word is a conjunction in the sentence: 'He will come if you invite him.'?
What is the past participle of 'eat'?
In the sentence 'The cat sat on the mat,' what is the preposition?
Which sentence is in the passive voice: 'The teacher praised the students.' or 'The students were praised by the teacher.'?
options: The students were praised by the teacher.
questions.correctOption: The students were praised by the teacher.
